rukus.text: Zhe shi wo de zhengju, wo ba ta shangci yi bo la xin, yibian ta bochi ta de zongzu. Wo jiang wo suo yiyu de ren tisheng ruogan ji. Ni de zhu, que shi zhi rui de, que shi quanzhi de

Wo shangci ta yi si ha ge he ye er gu bai, mei geren wo du jiayi yindao. Yiqian, wo ceng yindao nu ha, hai yindaoguo ta de houyi da wu de, su lai man, an you bo, you su fu, mu sa, ha lun, wo zheyang baochou xingshan de ren
(Wo ceng yindao) zai kai li ya, ye ha ya, er sa he yi lei ya si, tamen dou shi shanren
(Wo ceng yindao) yi sima yi, ai lei·ye sai, you nu si he lu te, wo ceng shi tamen chaoyue shiren
(Wo ceng yindao) tamen de yibufen zuxian, houyi he dixiong, ceng jianxuan tamen, bing zhishi tamen zhenglu
Zhe shi an la de zhengdao, ta yi ta yindao tasuo yu yindao de puren. Jiaruo tamen yi wu pei zhu, name, tamen de shangong biding bian cheng wu xiao de
Zhe deng ren, wo ceng ba tian jing, zhihui he yuyan shangci tamen. Ruguo zhexie ren buxin zhexie shiwu, name, wo jiu ba zhexie shiwu weituo yige duiyu tamen bu hui bu xin de minzhong
Zhe deng ren, shi an la yindao de ren, ni yingdang xiaofa tamen er zou zhengdao. Ni shuo:“Wo bu wei zhe bu jingdian er xiang nimen suoqu baochou, zhe bu jingdian shi dui zhong shijie de jiaoxun.”
